intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Emmaus Retreats, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our platform and services.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect the following personal information to provide you with our services:

items.personal: Name, last name, date of birth, and marital status
items.contact: Address, phone, email, and social media
items.demographic: Information about occupation, sacraments received, and parish

use.title: Use of Your Information
use.content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:

items.registration: Process your registration for Emmaus retreats and communities
items.communication: Communicate with you about retreats, events, and updates
items.improvement: Improve our services and user experience

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. This includes data encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze site traffic. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, though this may affect some functionalities.

thirdParties.title: Third Parties
thirdParties.content: We share your information with third parties only in the following circumstances:
thirdParties.google: Google: We use Google Maps and Google reCAPTCHA. See Google's privacy policy.
thirdParties.recaptcha: reCAPTCHA: We use Google's reCAPTCHA v3 to protect our forms from bots and abuse. The service analyzes device behavior to verify you are human.

items.access: Request access to your personal data
items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
items.objection: Object to processing of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Emmaus Retreats. These terms and conditions govern the use of our platform and services. By accessing and using our services, you accept these terms in full.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account and using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions, as well as our privacy policy.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: As a user of our platform, you commit to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate, truthful, and complete information during registration
items.password: Maintain the confidentiality of your password and account
items.conduct: Refrain from any conduct that could harm the platform or violate applicable laws
items.legal: Comply with all laws and regulations applicable when using our services

dataAccuracy.title: Data Accuracy
dataAccuracy.content: You are responsible for keeping your account information up to date. Inaccurate information may result in the suspension or termination of your account.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Emmaus Retreats shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of data, profits, or business opportunities.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time if you violate these terms or for any other reason at our discretion. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, design, and functionality of our platform is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works of our content without prior written permission.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will be effective as soon as they are posted on the platform. Your continued use of the services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws applicable in the relevant jurisdiction. Any dispute related to these terms will be resolved in the competent courts.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us:
